teaser: How well have you kept up on this week's tech news?
contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally. How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

This week we're joined by Julia Angwin, author of "Dragnet Nation: A Quest for Privacy, Security, and Freedom in a World of Relentless Surveillance."
description: How well have you kept up on this week's tech news?
title: Silicon Tally: Independence and surveillance
